author: Michelle Ghoussoub
title: 'Not the time': Small B.C. communities plead with vacationers to stay away during pandemic
description: With Easter weekend around the corner and spring temperatures climbing, B.C.'s provincial health officer and a number of rural communities are urging people to stay away from holiday homes and popular outdoor areas.
content:
With Easter weekend around the corner and spring temperatures climbing, B.C.'s provincial health officer and a number of rural communities are urging people to stay away from holiday homes and popular outdoor areas to stop the spread of COVID-19.
"This is no… [+3862 chars]
